DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether lengthening of both the tibiae and femora in achondroplastic patients is safe and provides reproducible outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Simultaneous Lengthening of Bilateral Femora and Tibiae in Achondroplastic Patients
DOC.criteria: Achondroplasia, first lengthening period Previous lengthening
